title: France Information
description: France is a country located in Western Europe. Its capital is Paris, which is known for landmarks such as the Eiffel Tower and the Louvre Museum.

requirements.title: Geography
requirements.content: France shares borders with Belgium, Luxembourg, Germany, Switzerland, Italy, Spain, and Andorra. It also has coastlines on the Atlantic Ocean, Mediterranean Sea, and English Channel.

requirements.title: Demographics
requirements.content: France has a population of approximately 67 million people. French is the official language, though many regional languages are also spoken.

requirements.title: Economy
requirements.content: France has the seventh-largest economy in the world. Key industries include tourism, manufacturing, and agriculture, with France being one of the world's largest exporters of wine and cheese.
